titulo: Spanish Short Stories for Beginners (Spanish Edition): Learn Spanish Language With Easy Stories & Grow Your Vocabulary, Volume 2
descripcion:
If you want to learn Spanish in an easy way and grow your vocabulary then keep reading...
The audiobook is designed so that people can improve their knowledge of the Spanish language by learning verbs, adjectives, past tense, dialogues, places, directions, day-to-day situations, and others. At the end of each story, you will find a summary of it in Spanish, so you have a general idea of what the story is about. At the end of the summary in Spanish, you will find that same summary but translated into English, so you can consult and find out what some words or sentences mean in case of doubt. At the end of the translated summary, you will find an incredible section with an outstanding vocabulary of each story, so if you don't understand the meaning, use, or context of a word, you may be able to find out what it means.
It is extremely important to note that Spanish is the second most spoken language in the world, while English is the third. Therefore, to learn it is an advantage that you will have in comparison to the other people. It will help you get jobs and positions with the possibility of traveling internationally. That's why, in this book, we give you 15 stories on different topics and situations, wherein in each one, we review basic aspects such as verbs, adjectives, adverbs, and grammar. A common vocabulary is also used.
